version_description: We've fixed up some minor bugs!

- GL Fox and Dastan Hiro have more realistic animation
- Minor bug fix

Check further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement icon!

Awesome things!
- New character, Mr.Blute added
- Eight new equipment added

Smooth as silk!
- Stadium graphic optimization

More enjoyment!
- Battle Royale reorganization
- Skill balance and pitcher's throwing force adjustment
- Highest league in My League changed

Check further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement icon!

* Brand New Shop!
- UI & Design change.
- ‘Daily Deals’ allows players to buy new cards updated daily added.
- ‘Huge Epic Chest’ guarantees at least one Allstar card. (If the 5th stadium is unlocked)

* More Strategies!
- The stadium selecting screen of both 1vs1 Match and Battle Royale shows which skill balls are appearing.
- Balance change for batting distance of hit decision against skill balls.

* Minor bug fixes

Check further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement!

▶ New Content 'Challenge Mode'
• Single Play
• Claim Daily Ranking chest and gold reward

▶ More Customizing
• New equipment "Ball" added

▶ Welcome everyone: Play Ball!
• Free gold items added
• More unique special offers

▶ UX Upgrade
• New language added: Japanese, Chinese (Trad.)
• Mailbox system

▶ Fixed some minor bugs.

Check further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement

▶ Global Ranking!
• 2 weeks of trophy winning competition with worldwide players
• Special prize for Top 100 players

▶ Nation Ranking!
• Let's become a National Player!
• Players from Top 3 Nation get premium discounts!

▶ Amazing Daily Gift w/ Quests
• 3 times a day, players get Daily Gifts
• Completing quest grants bonus gifts!

▶ UX Upgrade
• Invite friends and compete in friends ranking
• New language added: Spanish
• Balance changes

Check out further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement!

▶ Global Ranking!
• 2 weeks of trophy winning competition with worldwide players.
• Special prize for Top 100 players

▶ Nation Ranking!
• Let's become a National Player!
• Players from Top 3 Nation get premium discounts!

▶ Amazing Daily Gift w/ Quests
• 3 times a day, players get Daily Gifts
• Completing quest grants bonus gifts!

▶ UX Upgrade
• Invite friends and compete in friends ranking
• New language added: Spanish
• Balance changes

▶ Minor bug fix
- Dual hand control bug fixed
- Quest point fixed

Check out further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement!

▶ More Customizing
• A skill is added to the equipment with 'Major' rarity
• Profile picture change feature added

▶ Shop Upgrade
• New bundles products are added
• Daily Deals have more items on sale

▶ UX Upgrade
• More nations can get Nation Ranking special discounts
• Quest system improvement
• Friend invitation user convenience improvement
• UI upgrade

Check out further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement!

▶ RICH PACK: 3 times purchasable
▶ Minor bug fix

Check out further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement!

▶ Powerful and fantastic line-up!
• New batter, Jin Long added
• New skill for 'Bull Man' added

▶ Challenge mode improvement
• Now the game held in 'Challenge Park'
• Now can play 5 games maximum by watching ads

▶ Shop Upgrade
• New package item's added

▶ UX Upgrade
• Each stadium now has a max trophy reward
• East Plaza's aim dot (red dot) visibility improvement

Check out further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement!

▶ Powerful and fantastic line-up!
• ALLSTAR batter, LILI WANG added
• MAJOR batter, ROA CHOI added

▶ More Customizing
• 8 New equipment
• 3 New balls

▶ Welcome everyone: Play Ball!
• Added Missions with various rewards
• Increased odds of getting Allstar and Major for chests sold at the shop
• Added free gift on the daily deals menu

▶ UX Upgrade
• New language: Chinese (Simplified)
• UI upgrade

Check out further information at Homerun Clash Facebook page and in-game announcement!

▶ Tournaments Revamped
• Tournament is now available in Battle Royale mode

▶ Player Profile Improvements
• View your equipped gear from the profile page
• Check your best records and recent match history

▶ Shop Upgrade
• New package item's added

▶ UX Upgrade
• Turn individual push notifications ON/OFF
• UI improvement

For more details about the update, please check out the official Homerun Clash Facebook page or the in-game notices page!

▶ New Contents 'Tournament Mode'
• 3 days of competition in a special stadium!
• More wins, more rewards!

▶ Character skin system 'Style' added
• Keep your stats and upgrade your style.
• First Line-up: Gawain, Michael T, and Scarlet

▶ Welcome everyone: Play Ball!
• New Mission added
• New Skill [ROCKET BAT] added

▶ UX Upgrade

▶ All new 'VIVA STADIUM' opened

▶ Powerful and fantastic line-up
• All-Star batter 'ZOE STAR' added
• All-Star batter 'ROGAN CHOPPER' added

▶ 'FRIENDLY MATCH' is here
• Friends can now face off against each other in 1vs1 format

• 4 new skill cards

▶ New 'style'
• DASTAN HIRO - SUSHIMASTER

▶ Challenge mode improvement
• Additional 'Acquired Gold' bonus level added
• More Gems from Random Box draws

For more details about the update, please check out the official Homerun Clash Facebook page or the in-game notices page!

▶Clan System Added
• Create Clans and Clan Emblems
• Clan Bulletin and Rankings

▶ Tournaments Revamped
• New K.O. format tournament added

▶ New 'style'
• LILI WANG, MR. BLUT
• Profile pictures now reflect the same style upgrades that you've applied to your batter

▶ Everyone Welcome! Let's Play Ball!
• Rewards available based on number of acquired trophies

▶ Shop Upgrade
• New package item's added

For more details about the update, please check out the official Homerun Clash Facebook page or the in-game notices page!

▶ Clan Battles Added!
• Clans battle it out for glory in 1vs1 Match format
• Awesome rewards for the best clans!

▶ New 'style'
• ZOE STAR - ALLIE
• ROA CHOI - WATCHRABBIT

▶ Everyone Welcome! Let's Play Ball!
• Improvements to Battle Royale mode
• No wait time between Battle Star Chests"

For more details about the update, please check out the official Homerun Clash Facebook page or the in-game notices page!

Homerun Clash is back with Season 2!

▶ More To Do with Seasonal Events!
• Get event coins by doing various things in the game
• Exchange coins for awesome rewards!

▶ New Stadium 'Sphinx Park'!

▶ New Batters!
• Allstar grade 'Brodie' added
• Major grade 'Larry Blitz' added

▶ More Customization!
• Batter promotion system added
• 8 new gear cards
• 5 new skill cards

▶ More Convenience!
• Game balance adjustments
• New packages added
• UI layout overhauled

▶ New Content: "World Challenge"
• A competitive game mode where 100 players compete in real-time.
• Grand rewards and honor!

▶ More Customization!
• The 2nd promotion is now available for Major Batters.
• The 1st promotion is now available for Minor Batters.
• The 1st promotion is now available for Normal Batters.

▶ Improved Homerun Pass and Event
• New benefit has been added to Homerun Pass
• Coin Booster feature have been added

▶ Shop Upgrade
• Draft Chests have been added

▶ More Customization!
• The 2nd promotion is now available for All-Star Batters.

▶ More Convenience!
• My League Grade Expansion
• Clan Grade Expansion
• Added a player report feature
• Game balance adjustments

▶ Shop Upgrade
• New package item's added

For more details about the update, please check out the official Homerun Clash Facebook page or the in-game notices page!
